channel.title: [New Gamemode Suggestion] Madness Imperium
channel.description:
This is a revamp from my old post called "Total Madness Gamemode"
**Madness Imperium** is a gamemode idea made by me.
It works like this:
**25 players** needed to start the game. There is **no Fool or Scorned.**
**Both Cult And Unseen Spawns** , If Cult Leader or Mastermind tries to convert the other faction members, it will fail, if both factions tries to convert the same Blue Dragon in the same night, it will also fail.
**Layout:**
----------------------------- **The King**
65% Chance to be Blue Dragon
34% Chance to be Evil (Random evil faction)
1% Chance to be Psycho If the King is Psycho, there will be only 1 other Neutral Killer (See below)
----------------------------- **Blue Dragon**
**1** Prince with infinite uses of execution until he uses it on a Blue Dragon member
**14** Blue dragon members (1 confirmed Sheriff with a 2nd Sheriff chance and 1 confirmed Paladin with 2nd Paladin chance)
Sheriff and Paladin rework: If a Paladin finds a Unseen member, Sheriff will have this message: "A paladin found an Unseen member last night", same with Sheriff and cult
Paladin will not know he found an Unseen, and Sheriff will not know he found a Cult
**Blue Dragon can have 3 of the same class if not unique**
----------------------------- **Evil And Neutrals**
**1** Mastermind **1** Assassin **1** Cult Leader **1** Random cult member **2** Neutral Killers **3** Neutrals, There is 0% chance of a Social Neutral spawning in these games.
**Whats the point of Total Madness gamemode?**
Total Madness would be a super fun mode to play. Nobody will know whats happening the first days. Its a challenge to all veteran players and a new way to play Throne of Lies!
**FAQ**
**Unseen and cult has to defeat each other?** Yes.
**Neutral Killers can side to erradicate all 3 factions?** No, they have to fight, Only 1 neutral killer should win
**Why no Fool or Scorned?** Trollboxes in a 20 player game is too OP, And Scorned would have a really easy game since 4 executions would be super normal, also frame would be just too powerful.
**Can Paladin find a Unseen member and Sheriff Cult members?** Yes. In this gamemode, both investigators can get evil members, however, I explained above how it works in this gamemode.
**Smite kills the Mastermind?** No, but the Paladin gets a notification saying Mastermind tried to convert. Mastermind will fail the conversion. Paladin does not know who is the Mastermind.
**What happens if Mastermind converts a Paladin?**
He becomes a Marshal.
**Hope you like the Idea!** if you like it, I would love to see your feedback. Also **if you have a suggestion please tell me so!**

item.title: [New Gamemode Suggestion] Madness Imperium
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
RHCube:

Why can’t sheriff and paladin just be combined instead?(the same should happen for normal games)

I would like to point out that in Multiball it isn’t as big of a deal to have faction spacific Cops. This is because they aren’t giving away what faction it is if they are both always in play regardless

Read full topic

item.title: [New Gamemode Suggestion] Madness Imperium
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
I like the general idea, except for a few things.

4lan:

Sheriff and Paladin rework: If a Paladin finds a Unseen member, Sheriff will have this message: “A paladin found an Unseen member last night”, same with Sheriff and cult

Why can’t sheriff and paladin just be combined instead?(the same should happen for normal games)

4lan:

Trollboxes in a 20 player game is too OP

How? There can only be a maximum of 2 fools per game, which means that there can only be 2 trollboxes per day. Nobody complains about trollboxes right now, and they would be the same.

4lan:

And Scorned would have a really easy game since 4 executions would be super normal,

Increase the number then.

4lan:

also frame would be just too powerful.

Again, how? Frame is needed to prevent investigative results from being infallible.

Read full topic

item.title: [New Gamemode Suggestion] Madness Imperium
item.dc:creator: 4lan
item.description:
Well here is some changes:

Prince: No longer death Immune once, Now instead he has infinite uses of execution until he kills a Blue Dragon member

King: Now starting king has 65% chance of being BD, 34% Change of being a random evil faction, and 1% chance of being Psycho (The gamemode name is Madness Imperium, you need a super rare chance of this happening)

Now if Unseen converts a Paladin he becomes a Marshal

Now NKs cant side to win, only 1 can.

Sheriff and Paladin rework: If a Paladin finds a Unseen member, Sheriff will have this message: “A paladin found an Unseen member last night”, same with Sheriff and cult

Paladin will not know he found an Unseen, and Sheriff will not know he found a Cult

Read full topic

item.title: [New Gamemode Suggestion] Madness Imperium
item.dc:creator: 4lan
item.description:
Hi everyone,

As you can see, the gamemode its not perfect, and Im taking your feedback and suggestions.

I will do some changes to make it more balanced right now.

Hope you like them.

Read full topic

item.title: [New Gamemode Suggestion] Madness Imperium
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Marluxion:

Change paladins back to only finding cult, same with Sheriff for Unseen. They don’t need to be able to find both to make the game interesting.

Alternatively keep one and rework the other into something else entirely

Read full topic

item.title: [New Gamemode Suggestion] Madness Imperium
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
Remove neutral starting king, it doesn’t exist in tol for good reason. It’s just boring to play and requires no skill or deduction.

Re-add Fool and scorned, if it’s meant to be a fun game mode you shouldn’t be removing some of the most fun classes.

Change paladins back to only finding cult, same with Sheriff for Unseen. They don’t need to be able to find both to make the game interesting.

Make NKs unable to win when each other. This forces them to do some deduction otherwise it’ll come down to who can bypass immunity.

Change the number of neutrals from 3 to 3-5 so the role list isn’t the same every game

Read full topic
